hero.subtitle: Technology & blockchain
hero.description: Discover a modern marketplace with seamless Web3 payments, rewards, and verified sellers. Fast, secure, and built for everyone.
hero.HEroLastPara: A stablecoin designed for everyday use — buy, send, and receive instantly, backed by dollars.

systems.title: More than a cryptocurrency, a financial bridge.
systems.subtitle: Integrations & on-ramping

mtc.MTCrightPara2: Pay with MTC and access factory-level prices on top products.
mtc.MTCrightPara3: Stability for spending, payments, and saving.
mtc.MTCLeftPara: MeetCoin is not just another cryptocurrency — it's your stable payment coin. Send it, receive it, and use it to buy anything on Mercado Meet. Plus, with MTC you get cashback and exclusive discounts so your money goes further.

Sistamas.sistemasHeadingHighlight: MTC is the native token of the Mercado Meet and Pago Meet ecosystem. Use it to charge, pay, send, and save; integrate crypto payments into your business with ultra-low fees and 24/7 liquidity.
Sistamas.sistemasParagraph: Instant payments: transfer MTC in seconds from your wallet.
Sistamas.sistemasParagraph2: Connection with exchanges and P2P markets (coming soon): swap MTC for other cryptocurrencies whenever you need.

Stablecoin.Stableparagraph1: Play in a simple way: choose a number from 00 to 99, spin the wheel and, if you guess correctly, you win MTC that you can use to shop on Mercado Meet, redeem for products, or exchange for money.
Stablecoin.Stableparagraph2: Win MTC instantly — test your luck.
Stablecoin.Stableparagraph3: Use it wherever you want — pay on Mercado Meet with exclusive discounts.

Pogomeet.PogoMeetSecOnePara1: Buy MTC with credit card, debit card, or bank transfer.
Pogomeet.PogoMeetSecOnePara3: Automatic cashback on your purchases and marketplace withdrawals.
Pogomeet.PogoMeetSecOnePara4: You have 100% control — we do not store your keys or private access.
Pogomeet.PogoMeetSecTwoPara1: Pay with MTC for any product in the marketplace.
Pogomeet.PogoMeetSecTwoPara2: Exclusive discounts and factory-level prices when paying with MTC.
Pogomeet.PogoMeetSecTwoPara3: Vendor payments in MTC with ultra-low fees.

Respaldado.RespaldadoCardPara1: MTC maintains a 1:1 parity with USD, and its backing is denominated in USDT, with controls and strong compliance and audit practices. Our priority is ensuring you can pay, save, and settle with the confidence of a stable currency for everyday use.
Respaldado.RespaldadoHeadPara2: 1:1 parity with USD for stable purchases.
Respaldado.RespaldadoHeadPara3: Backed by USDT with custody controls.
Respaldado.RespaldadoHeadPara5: Best practices in compliance and security.

Gestio.GestionHead2: with lower fees when charging in MTC
Gestio.GestionPara1: Receive payments in MTC on Mercado Meet and reduce your selling costs compared to traditional marketplaces. Settle whenever you want and offer better prices to your customers thanks to our more efficient cost structure.
Gestio.GestionPara2: With MeetCoin you can earn rewards, send and receive payments instantly, shop in the marketplace, and use it as a financial asset with real market value.
Gestio.GestionPara3: Your money, your control, your digital future.

meetcards.ColThirdPara2: Preferential commission for payments in MTC. Fast processing.
meetcards.ColThirdPara3: Depends on category and publication type.
meetcards.ColThirdPara5: Sales commission; conditions vary by agreement/market.
meetcards.MeetCardFooter: Exclusive preferential commission for withdrawing sales balance in MTC on PagoMeet.

Juega.JuegaText: With Meetcoin, fun also becomes an opportunity. Our play-to-earn system allows you to enjoy unique gaming experiences while accumulating real Meetcoins. Each game is not just entertainment: it's your gateway to the future of digital finance, where the time you invest in playing transforms into value.

Tokenreq.paragraph1: Meetcoin is the native cryptocurrency of the MercadoMeet and PagoMeet ecosystem.
Tokenreq.paragraph2: You can receive it as cashback on your purchases, send or receive it through the wallet, and even use it as a financial asset that grows with you.

MeetcoinNotched.FooterCaption1: • The availability of services and reporting obligations may vary by country and applicable regulations.
MeetcoinNotched.FooterCaption2: • MeetCoin does not in itself constitute an offer of securities. Review the Terms and Conditions and the Compliance Policy.
MeetcoinNotched.FooterCaption3: • We are currently undergoing alignment with regulatory frameworks applicable in the U.S. for stablecoins and digital payments.
MeetcoinNotched.subtitle: Buy and pay with freedom
MeetcoinNotched.description: Meetcoin is the native crypto asset of MercadoMeet and the PagoMeet wallet. Designed to be more than a payment method, Meetcoin lets you earn rewards, make virtual purchases, send and receive money instantly, and also acts as a financial investment asset.

regulatedToken.title: Regulated Token:
regulatedToken.text: Designed under strict financial security standards.

stability.title: Stability and Liquidity
stability.text: Designed for seamless operation across exchanges and trading platforms.

growth.title: Grow Your Capital
growth.text: Hold Meetcoin as a digital asset and take part in the new global financial model.
